body_html: @sleepfin Bias and activation are applied on the concatenated results of conv groups as you may find on line 194 (concat), line 218 (bias add), and line 221 (activation). BN is implemented as a separate layer which I think is out of the scope of conv layers.

body: @sleepfin Bias and activation are applied on the concatenated results of conv groups as you may find on line 194 (concat), line 218 (bias add), and line 221 (activation). BN is implemented as a separate layer which I think is out of the scope of conv layers.
